# Repair Moderate Damage, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One construct/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 189

This spell functions like *[[Repair Light Damage, Mass (Spell)|mass repair light damage]]**,* except that it repairs 2d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +30).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 6, Wizard 6 to Level.
